product_name: Club Ride Cargo Away Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: Technically speaking, the Club Ride Cargo Away shorts are made for adventures on 2 wheels. An added bonus is that they've got a lot going for them in the style department too. Lightweight stretch nylon fabric resists abrasion and wicks moisture when you're working hard. Fabric provides UPF 30 protection from harmful solar rays. Cam-lock adjusters on sides of the waistband allow you to personalize the fit. Seamless crotch gusset allows for unhindered movement when you're in the saddle. Zippered side cargo pockets keeps your stuff secure and still there at the end of your ride.
short_description: Technically speaking, the Club Ride Cargo Away shorts are made for adventures on 2 wheels. An added bonus is that they've got a lot going for them in the style department too.
